website_summaries.verdict: A great-looking and super solid poker table for those looking to take their weekly game to the next level.
pros: Folds in half for easy storage
cons: Very heavy and lacks handles, which can make it difficult to lug around
It folds in, which leaves the felt and leather surface of the table exposed

customer_reviews.title: Loose cloth. A real bummer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the table because of the portability and storeability, the fact that it folds up is a big plus. I am disappointed in the playing surface, the fabric is very loose on the table to the point tha tit affects the ability to deal cards. There were also a few spots of glue on the cloth. For the $200 I paid I could live with some minor defects like other people have described but the playing surface being sub par really sucks. Way too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Majic mike

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I am Very disappointed. It states that the cup holders are metal, they are cheap plastic. Every picture shows a decal of the flop, turn and river on the table, it's just plain blue. As previously stated by other consumers, the felt is loose as can be, almost unplayable. And the padded surrounding is dented. I know I didn't buy a $1000 table but come on. Flase advertising and poor quality. I would return it if it wasn't such a pain in the ass to return this large table. I want my money back or send me a damn table as pictured on the site. Metal cup holders, decal on the felt and felt that is actually installed correctly. Boooo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of complaints about the cup holder now being plastic. Mine arrived and had the metal ones. So haha. Table is beautiful done, have not set it up yet so I can't attest to the sturdiness of the table. But I can say it is solid. A little awkward to move around as I don't feel you can get a good grip on it. Overall I like the table for the value, and am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Stark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic poker table
customer_reviews.text: I host a "home game" every month or two, this table steals the show. For the money, you simply can't beat it. Good quality, very well made for the price. Spilled beer on it the first use, it cleaned up like gangbusters, no beer smell, no evidence of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Folding Poker Table
customer_reviews.text: This is the second best folding table out there, and it's way cheaper than the best from BBO. Padding on the rail is comfortable. The table feels solid when set up. The cup holders will fit a normal sized can and they're a little over an inch deep. This thing is pretty heavy though, you might need two people to move it around. The plastic buckle and strap will not actually hold the table closed for storage. And if you try to use the strap as a handle, it WILL break. I'm speaking from experience. Other than that, it's an excellent product. I'm very satisfied. Now if only the felt design wasn't so lame.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: "Premium" model is damaged
customer_reviews.text: Waited longer for the "premium" option of this table to get to me, but as soon I opened it up I heard stuff rattling around on the inside. Sure enough two screws had popped out and the table is unusable. Even screwing them back in myself, as soon as you move the table at all they just pop right on out again. The bottom of it is scratched in places and appears to have been colored in with a sharpie. If you love paying extra to wait longer and get broken products then definitely buy this. If you did accidentally buy this, good luck paying for the 70 lbs trash heap in postage to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it could break
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning it. It has some nice features, but if you were to lean on the sides continually it would bend. Also if you lean on the folding center it seems like it could collapse. So I guess if you are into playing poker gingerly, than this table would be ok.
customer_reviews.author: customer1221

customer_reviews.title: And there's a big scratch on on side along with what looks like it scraped along something hard cause some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: As much as it was packed in 2 boxes. Took it out the box carefully. And there's a big scratch on on side along with what looks like it scraped along something hard cause some of the black paint came off. However the price of this thing was too good to pass up versus the more expensive higher end stuff Update: I had to knock it down to a 1 star. The felt has no separated from the board it was glued too. So now I have 2 big bulges (1 for each side of the table) tried to put some wood over the top for a few days to see if it goes down but no luck
customer_reviews.author: DJ Speed

customer_reviews.title: Entire Top of Table WARPED within 9 months!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product when it was purchased in April 2017. However, we just pulled it out for a Texas Holdem Tournament tonight and the entire table is warped. We stored it folded upright in our office. So, the temperature was regulated at all times. The entire top of the table is warped and I'm not sure how to get in touch with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Great Poker Table
customer_reviews.text: I researched a lot of different tables before pulling the trigger on this one and I am so glad that I did. The price of this table was less than what I was willing to pay for in order to get a quality poker table that would not be ugly or look cheap and would last for a long time, I consider this a GREAT buy more than worth the price I paid. Eight people fit comfortably while playing. It is large when folded up for storage (but that is to be expected for this investment) so make sure you have a place for it that will keep it nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Poker Table!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is my second review on a gaming table, yes we have this set up in our office. This has by far exceeded my expectations. I am glad I went with this table! Cushioned speed felt is a tad bit loose, but perfect playing surface. Legs are sturdy Arm rests are what I would expect at a professional table, Cup holders are a tad bit shallow but whatever. They work. Our drivers lounge is really becoming quite the man cave. Everyone loves playing on these tables.
customer_reviews.author: D A

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The table I received would not open all the way so I had to remove an arm rest from each side and then remove the staples from leather from the ends and peel back leather and cut 1/8" to 1/4" of wood using my table saw and then restaple leather ends and remount arm rests. All good now and opens fully. Side note, I was not happy with the shallow depth cup holders so I order 6 deep plastic cup holder replacements and bought a hole saw bit to drill through table to make the deep ones work.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for the price-but heavy to move to other locations
customer_reviews.text: We started a poker group that rotates to a different house every few weeks. The table is great, it sets up and stores easy, but it doesn't relocate easy. It's weight and size makes it awkward to move it from house to house. Also, it won't fit in some cars. That being said, it's such a nice table and at good price each location has bought one--so no more lugging for us. It's very study. The fabric could be tauter--mine is fine, but my friends is a tiny bit lose (quality control). One other point, the cup holders could be deeper and should removable for easy cleaning. All in all very happy with this purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Angela J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice home table
customer_reviews.text: Table is a little smaller than I really wanted but it is well made and sets up well. The fold does not interfere with dealing or moment of chips. Cup holders are a little small for some cups but is OK for beer cans. The layout does not really line up with how a dealer will lay out the Flop Turn and River. The squares are two far apart and not what you will do in a real game. Some other graphic would have been better. Ok for 10 players, but tight. We sometimes play with 10 players and a dealer so my home game is very tight don't think we could sit 11.
customer_reviews.author: Cajinjoe

customer_reviews.title: Fine for its Price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. A bit easy to damage the vinyl, such as when it leaned against a window sill and got the well-set paint on it due to some sort of interaction. I also tore a bit, but that is because I use it a lot. The Flop, Turn, River indicators in the middle are a pro and a con--we use them. Drink holders are fine but pop out. So the bottom line is I got my money's worth but it is not high-end.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harville

customer_reviews.title: Great table but needed work
customer_reviews.text: Overall all we love the table. We did have an issue with the cable below being to short and we added a turnbuckle to fix it. With the short wire it would not allow lay flat. We also added LED lights to the table on the top of the table and underneath.
customer_reviews.author: shonnon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Love my purchase, and would recommend this to anyone wanting a Big, sturdy poker table! PROS... Beautiful!! Sturdy! Well packaged and arrived in great condition! CONS... Flippin heavy!! I bought this as a gift/surprise for my husband’s birthday.. I could not bring it into the house by myself. I can not put it into the back of my suv by myself!!! Aand.. it’s not going to be easy to move around to store it and bring it out!! HOWEVER... my husband can move it! It’s just a little awkward!
customer_reviews.author: BookRaven0609

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I really had hesitations getting a folding poker table because of bad experiences with the such. But I have to say that this one is well built. Very sturdy, and can handle a bit of a beating. Does not feel like a flimsy folding table at all. Friends were very impressed. Weekly Poker nights here we come!
customer_reviews.author: BumblebeeDC

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this table
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a table for some time and saw this one and thought I'd give it a shot. First one arrived with a large white stain on the felt. Other than that it was a solid table. But at $250 I want it to be perfect so I packed it up and sent it back. Ordered a replacement table. This one was worse, a hole in the vinyl arm rest, the trim on the side of the table was banged up and broken. Doubt I'll try again.
customer_reviews.author: JAD5268

customer_reviews.title: Decent Table - Not 10 Player Capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality table at this price range. Pretty sturdy, doesn't sag & holds up well to guys learning on it. Playing area & arm rest are padded fairly well. Cupholders are shallow, probably because it's a folding table & that's really all you can put in there. However, there is no possible way you're going to get 10 average sized people sitting at this table. If your players are all 200+lbs, you're going to fit 8 tops. 7 comfortably. I suppose you can't expect it at this price range but a table cover would've been a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Front9Pretender

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking table for the price. The padding on the table and rails feel professional. The only gripe is that I would have expected it to come with some sort of cover. It is also very heavy so not all that portable.
customer_reviews.author: Silvrsurfer

customer_reviews.title: Steady and nice . Screw upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Great table the 3/4" screws that hold legs to table were installed on a angle and didn't hold very much wood. The first time I open the table the screws came out. So I replaced all the screws with 1 inch screws in the proper spots . Have had 3 home game since installing. Everybody loves it nice table cup holders could be a little deeper. But it's a good excuse to not let anybody put a cup in them.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Tree

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but... (Cup holders are tiny)
customer_reviews.text: I like it for the most part but a real issue is the cup holder size. They are tiny. I mean a normal beer in a thin coozie will not fit in it. So no yeti cups or anything like that. Very irritating. This is just my overflow table as I built a nice one for the main poker room so I will keep it but they need to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Joines

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of overall quality
customer_reviews.text: The table looks nice and is very heavy. However, the legs are attached with small screws, which were all ripped from the frame upon delivery. I was able to reattach the legs with thicker screws but other may have had to return the unit. The outer shipping box was 100% damaged. The inner box was was also damaged but as stated above it appears the outer shipping box took the majority of the damage. Besides the legs being damaged the until appears to be in good condition. Not sure if it was worth the value. I will update this after using for a while
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in and HOLY smokes at the quality.. you just open box then unfold and you are playing cards... VERY VERY VERY well built.. I got the brown felt which I dont really like. I assumed I would get the one in the main picture. Guess not.. But the table is so well built im not really gonna raise hell. This is a definite buy if you need a hold em table and have 325 to blow
customer_reviews.author: Codie Cauthen

customer_reviews.title: Really good for 180$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table when it was 180$ on amazon and am extremely happy with my purchase. It is very sturdy for being so cheap and portable. The fabrics are all also very good. Don’t see it lasting forever, but it should be good for the next few years. The portability aspect of it isn’t as great. It is foldable but is difficult for one person to move on it’s own. You also will damage the leather when you put it on its side to fold it up. With that being said, awsome table and definently a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bellissimo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Damaged out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Thinking about returning this. Out of the box there is a cut in the armrest, it is very noticeable. Also the table won't open fully and lay flat. It arches a few degrees on both ends. Good size and outside of these issues it's not a bad table. But, hate having those issues with an item that is the focal part 9f the game.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Minor defects. Otherwise a greaat table
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a very good table. Sturdy, and it comes assembled. Slight heavy though. It comes with minor defects as show in the attached photos. One would think that quality control would catch this. Annoying enough not to give it 5 stars, but not enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: fossa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table for the price. It was moe then expected. Good quality, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Table is sturdy and can handle 10 players and a dealer. Playing surface and rails better then expected. You cannot build one for this cost. Works well. Very impressed. Love Amazon, UPS- Not so much!!! -delivered UPS- which was a horrible experience-Promised 3-5. On the 5th day - it took 40 hours to go 1.5 hours between distribution enters. - I was told due to weather- I was IN the same weather, which was just cold. My daily commute is longer then it had to travel- No local phone support- all overseas who follow a script. Horrible . Arrived 3 days late.
customer_reviews.author: Joe.S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my husband a poker table for a casino night birthday party, but needed one that was foldable so we don’t have to leave it up taking space in the house. This was absolutely perfect! Lays flat when open, it is very sturdy and built perfect! Great product! Fit a lot of people around it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! Top notch fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was a bit skeptical that it would be as high quality as it is. This thing is amazing! Top notch fit and finish, and its sturdy...this thing isn't going to fall apart after your first poker game. Buy with confidence, you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Needs protection when folded and stored
customer_reviews.text: I wish this came with a cover!!! It folds up but when it is folded the felt it to the outside and could very well get damaged while being stored or moved. The material around the outside is particle board and does chip over time (I have only had this product since September 2017 - 6 months). Made fairly well for the price, and we love the vivid colors.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyn Strouse

customer_reviews.title: Cup holders not deep enough - expect to knock over beer bottles
customer_reviews.text: Used the table three times. . It is heavy and takes two people to fold up and put away. Have had 8 people which is about the max for comfort. Very happy with table. No issues on delivery and quality was good. People have a tendency to lift up the cup holders, the glue does come off so they lift out. Would be interested in replacing the cup holders with deeper versions but then it wouldn't fold up. Overall very happy with look and quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good but has some issues.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very heavy so you need two people to move it and it doesn’t have a good handle system so you have to use cup holders as grip spots and they will dislodge. Mine came busted on one of the leg parts that would be connected to wood. Not a big deal cause I just drilled a new hole for it to go in. Looks sexy as he’ll though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This table is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived nicely packaged with no damage. Opened it up and yes it's a bit smallish for 10 players. But it is well built, sturdy enough to rest your elbows on it and the padding around the edge is more than sufficient and not flimsy at all. Nice table, classy appearance and we will enjoy this for a long time! A very good purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Russo

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but the cup holders rust instantly
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the table is pretty nice and sturdy. The playing surface is nice and cards slide on it without much resistance. The padded edges are a nice touch and make extended games easy. However, the "stainless" steel cup holders rusted as soon as a few sweaty drinks were placed in them. For as much as this table costs, I'm really disappointed that they cheaped out on the stainless steel they used. Nice table and all, just beware the cup holders will rust the second you pull it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Both external and internal boxes arrived in great condition, and seemed packaged well. When unfolding to set up, noticed one metal support to the middle wood frame had completely pulled out of the wood. The metal support also did not line up. Found a 1/2” screw, but only 1 in the packaging. Not happy unfolding a broken table.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shroyer

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with the table. As I read in an another review the cloth was a little loose at one end, but for the price and how sturdy the table is, it’s hardly even noticed. Everyone asked me where I got the table and all said it was very nice. We had 10 people playing, it was a little tight but no more that what u would expect when you think of 10 big dudes sitting around a table drinking and playing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, not so nice felt pattern
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these tables, was able to get it a really great bargain price. The table itself is a nice table, sturdy, and ample room for our needs. I only wish it did not have this ridiculous pattern on it! Who in there right mind would actually be able to use this pattern and get the cards to the designated boxes? Please make a table with the option of a solid color or faux speed cloth and I will buy 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a used table. Scuff mark on the blue top and the black trim around the table is already peeled away showing the particle board underneath. Should've kept the oak table he had. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: The item was broken right out of the box (leg frame fastening screws stripped from the box frame assembly). Hoping and praying that this is one time anomaly.
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: This table is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Look no further. This is the one. The padding on the table and armrests is great. The cloth is amazing. No bumps, the cards fly across it perfectly. The table is stable and strong. No damaged packaging - no damage at all. Not wobbly. Works exactly like it should. YES THE CUPS ARE SHALLOW SO WHAT. Get a side table. As far as dealing and playing goes, this table is amazing. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I order this table for my husband birthday and we just open it new (almost 2 months after) and the bottom of the the table are broke and we need to put some Chairs to hold it when we play. The table are very nice looking but if all the products are in this Quality it’s not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality already falling apart. Have not even used it yet.
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible decision on purchasing this item. This is very poor quality. 1 cup holder is bent and 3 are loose and seem to be ready to fall of. The table is very wobbly and does not sit flat. I do not recommend this table. Box was delivered somewhat damaged. Please do not waste your money on this poor quality poker table.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My new Gaming Table!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of setting up a card table or a larger folding table each time. Even though this is bigger and heavier, it's soooo much better that the other options. My only -1 star choice is from when you are sitting and leaning on the table; it creaks a bit. I put a small shim of paper into the areas with the creak and it's fine now. Great for larger board games!
customer_reviews.author: DirkBraddock

customer_reviews.title: Great folding poker table.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son as a birthday gift. The packaging was pretty damaged upon receipt but no issues with the table itself.
customer_reviews.author: Chad H

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. This table makes you feel like you are in Las Vegas and spills clean up nicely off the rag. The cup holders.could have been a bit deeper but other than that, excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: Forrester Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy once set up .  Hinges weak. All around game table.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quick setup table . Arrived with the hinges busted off . Those screws in cheep plywood ain't getting it . Be prepared to fix this yourself rather than send it all back . Very heavy to ship . Sturdy table once you get it unfolded. Use it not only for poker , but as a family board game table too .
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Howard

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: My husband and his poker buddies really like this table. The fabric and cushioning is professional grade. It is very sturdy and fairly heavy. We were concerned it would sag in the middle, since it folds in half for storage, but it doesn't at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joette T

customer_reviews.title: BEST TABLE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this table its exactly what I wanted... Looks and feels like at real table, but has the versatility to fold up Great Product and great price..... The only problem I found was the cup holders were not properly glued down and are very shallow (guess they have to be so the table can fold up)
customer_reviews.author: Phil R

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these tables for a poker night with my customers and could not be happier. They are very well built and sturdy. My customers were very impressed with the tables and I will be purchasing another one soon so we can add some more people to our poker night. If you want a table that will hold up over time then this is the table for you.
customer_reviews.author: karl bowen

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Cheap wood in base!
customer_reviews.text: This table would be great if it was sturdier. The screws on the base of it pulled out of the cheap wood on the base. Very frustrating and the table wobbles in the middle. The table is pretty heavy as well. Two of the screws where stripped out when we got it and the rest of them stripped out within a week. Good idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great poker table while still being able to bring it places.
customer_reviews.text: Friends and i trade off whose house we play at and most people don't have a table to play at so we were making do. But we got this table and the table is solid and with the cup holders we don't have any mishaps. the fabric is really good and allows the cards to slide with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: know when to holed em
customer_reviews.text: bought for my brother-in-law he and his buddies have enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looks!
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is a little loose in some tiny spots, but still great for poker nights.. my buddies were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Also useful for RPG's and board game nights!!
customer_reviews.text: So I run a Dungeons And Dragons session and this table makes a perfect table for that if you have a grid. the cupholders also make excellent dice rolling trays
customer_reviews.author: KaineVillante

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: An amazing deal! This table is easily worth at least twice it’s Sosa, and the free, fast shipping is simply icing on the cake. Can’t say enough about it, it is sturdy and the quality is simply awesome
customer_reviews.author: Robert Del Presto

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my husband and I am really impressed with the quality of this table for the price that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: So good for the price. The writing on the felt is printed in not on the felt, the arm rests are super good, it is sturdy and nice. The only downside is that it’s not perfectly flat. Not sure if it can be adjusted but it doesn’t affect gameplay. Overall best table for the price by far.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Costa

customer_reviews.title: Good value, no bag to protect
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money but heavy and hard to store. Doesn’t come with a bag to protect it either??
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best poker table we can get it in amazon on ...
customer_reviews.text: We had been thinking to buy a poker table since last 2 years. This is the best poker table we can get it in amazon on budget price. Build quality is really nice and nice cushion to rest your arms. bottle holder should be one more inch deeper to hold the glasses to beer bottles much safer.Overall product is really good and I coudn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Worst Amazon purchase ever!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Table collapsed when setting it up. Wire rope pulled out of crip. Wood support near the middle of table pulled out and felt is now loose. This is the worst item I have ever ordered on Amazon! Poor design. Now the size of this item I don't know how I would return. Box has been recycled already.
customer_reviews.author: noah

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table for the money. When it came the outer box had minor damaged but the inner box and table were fine. The only reason I'm not given it 5 stars is because the felt feels like it's not going to last very long. The poker chips we used, which are clay chips, put a snag in the felt one time and we played about a 100 hands or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great poker table
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his birthday for his poker nights with the boys. They all loved it he can’t stop bragging about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Used by a group of teenage poker players. Still in great shape, that says it all!
customer_reviews.author: laurel scicchitano

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: He loves this poker table still held up after almost a year with continuous use. Still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 50th birthday present for my dad and he LOVED it! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great poker table
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability of this table. The only problem is it's a little heavy for one person to handle. But it is well-built's and is was exactly what is looking for to move around. Really like the cupholders.
customer_reviews.author: Romie E. Bassetto

customer_reviews.title: Overall wasn't happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Table didn't get completely flat which was perfectly fine but wasn't very stable wood tilt either directions. It did look cool, but craftsmanship wasn't as good as I thought it would be and it should come with a strap so that one person can carry it.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Bought for gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. This table is very nice and well made, very impressed with it. My husband and his friends seem to enjoy it for poker night.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to brush clean. Looks professional. Added some small tape like lighting looks even better at half the cost
customer_reviews.author: ronald marek

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful and very sturdy, Did have an issues with the legs, the screws had fallen out where they connect in the middle of the table, I used longer screws to replace and all was fine, otherwise the table is everything I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dinius

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great table but doesn’t come with any cover and folds outward. Meaning the felt is always exposed when storing. Also the felt was misaligned in the center
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Built decent showed up in a box that had been ripped then taped or open.The cushion on the rail was defective or just poor quality on a section of the rail. very noticeable. And it had hair on it like it was used then sent back and just reshipped, I would have returned it if I had not tore the box to shreds getting to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Not best felt quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this poker table. Only one negative. The felt could be a better quality. It's really thin layer and feels like it can brake anytime. But looks really good and for the money it's really good
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great poker table
customer_reviews.text: The table is more of a 8 person table, jut you can certainly squeeze 10 on there. Other than that it's a really nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Chesbrough

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great table. I couldn’t believe how sturdy and well built this is. Has good weight which I guess would make it a little difficult if someone was putting it up and down often but mine is in a permanent spot in my basement. This is a awesome table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful poker table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband given he loves inviting his friends over for poker nights. We have received nothing but compliments on the quality of this table. It’s perfect for his game nights and when not in use, it folds up and stores nicely! Great poker table for poker night!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Hood

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy!! Looks like a pretty nice table so far!
customer_reviews.author: Racie B

customer_reviews.title: Leg ws broken
customer_reviews.text: Leg was broken, didnt want to spend the time lugging it to ups
customer_reviews.author: joanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality table for just as much as plain ones
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the table. Looks quality. No loose felt like some said. Perfect shape. Wish it was a bit bigger. With 10 players u will be a lil crammed but it works. Arm rests are nice. Nice cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and awesome looking. Solid construction. Brought two 4 price Cosco chair sets which go perfectly with this table
customer_reviews.author: Ash Doc

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This table is pretty sturdy. The quality is great but it is heavy. The feel of it almost feels exactly like the one in the card room except the legs are foldable for storage. Perfect for poker night with families and friends.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in quality of manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this table for only a few weeks and all the paint is literally falling of the table legs exposing rusty metal. Very disappointed in quality of manufacturing. I would lol elsewhere due to lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

customer_reviews.title: Wicked nice & highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Wicked nice, large, comfortable, and professional quality poker table. Better quality = better experience. Well worth the purchase. I’m proud to invite friends over for poker night and can this will be enjoyed for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Yeung

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice table for the price being under $200
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice table for the price being under $200. It is sturdy and well made and it's great that it folds up when you're not using it. I'd say 8 people is about right for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid table
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid table, heavy, and needs two people to set up. My problem is that the screws keep popping out and it makes the table uneven. Wish it was more stable so I could fold and unfold it with ease. Otherwise it looks nice... have only used it once
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: It came to me damaged :-(
customer_reviews.text: Product came to me damaged, but the damaged part is not visible as it is underneath. It does not hinder the products intended use thus I will keep it rather than send back. I'm using it as a roulette table and it does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: James Varner

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: The table looks nice at first glance, but it is not sturdy. The table bends inward, especially as more people are playing. Not satisfied with this product, looks great in pictures and cheap in person. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LenB

customer_reviews.title: Solid Table, Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This table is really nice and well constructed. It fits everyone comfortably and is high quality. It is super heavy and hard to move around though!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table especially for the price. Came double boxed so it was well protected. Set up was super easy! The quality of the table is very evident from the get go. Love the padded surface and rail. If I had to be picky the only thing I could say that is a little concerning is the shallowness of the drink holders. Looks like beverages could tip easily. Other wise this is as close to perfect as you are gonna get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, play cards every couple months with 6 guys, holding up after 2 games.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of compliments from the guys I play poker with, everyone loves this table.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good Poker Table
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my first poker table purchases and it was a good decision. The table is perfect for card games and is very sturdy. The cupholders need to be deeper because I sudden move and your drinks gets spilled onto the table. Overall I give it 4 out 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Demond

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table, wrong color delivered.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. It got delivered a week early but it is the wrong color. I ordered the premium table in the photos. This is nice but I want the color I ordered. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: darius

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I ever made. The felt is good quality and the seam lines up perfect when you unfold it. Even if it doesn’t, there is an adjustable setting to line it up. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brinson Raley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in two damaged boxes, card table is in horrible condition. Broken legs and able brackets. Avoid this product at all costs. Update - we decided to make repairs to the table as opposed to a return given the condition of the shipping boxes. We secured the under structure of legs and angle bracket so the table will stand. The ENTIRE table is bowed and will not sit level. This product only gets worse!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: The table is very nice. Love the fact that it snaps to closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so great. Quality, stability, design. Very very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: nice poker table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. The cup holders could be a little deeper, but this makes for a good poker night, The cards slide across the table nicely. Decent product
customer_reviews.author: Jason L Reynolds

product_meta.title: Barrington Collection Poker Table with Padded Rails and Cup Holders
feature_bullets: 10 PLAYER POSITIONS with Poker layout vibrantly designated on our iconic black felt surface. No game room or man cave is complete without this stylish and durable card game table.

PLAY LIKE THE PROS with this casino style Poker Table by Barrington. The felt cover features traditional Poker appointments, but you can use this versatile table for all of your favorite card and board games.

COMPACT PORTABILITY lets you take the action to your friends’ homes. This durable table folds in half for easy storage under your bed or loading into your car. Unfolded dimensions: 84"L x 42"W x 30"H.

FAUX LEATHER PADDED RAILS let players comfortably rest their forearms on the table during play. Built-in cup holders keep sweaty glasses and tumblers off of the felt surface without depriving guests of refreshment.
FOLDABLE DESIGN for compact portability and easy storage. Dimensions after folding: 42"L x 42"W x 5"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
